English
He thought it was over. After fighting his way out of a building filled
with gangsters and madmen - a fight that left the bodies of police and
gangsters alike piled in the halls - rookie Jakarta cop Rama thought it
was done and he could resume a normal life. He couldn't have been more
wrong. Formidable though they may have been, Rama's opponents in that
fateful building were nothing more than small fish swimming in a pond
much larger than he ever dreamed possible. And his triumph over the small
fry has attracted the attention of the predators farther up the food
chain. His family at risk, Rama has only one choice to protect his infant
son and wife: He must go undercover to enter the criminal underworld
himself and climb through the hierarchy of competing forces until it leads
him to the corrupt politicians and police pulling the strings at the top
of the heap. And so Rama begins a new odyssey of violence, a journey that
will force him to set aside his own life and history and take on ...
